title: Lila - An Inqury Into Morals by Robert M. Pirsig - Chapter 32
description: In this final chapter, Pheadrus ties together several strands of inquiry that prompted the formulation of the MoQ in which they are united in a single sentence that is and imperfect but "close enough" as a description of a Metaphysics based on something indescribable.
